content:
So, did you find a game that works for two people?
How about we play cards?
What do you say to a card game?

Actually, I was just playing cards by myself earlier when I got bored~!
Oh, I know! How about I add you as a new character?

Thank you for the invitation,
It's not that your invitation isn't appealing,
I just haven't had my fill of my hometown's scenery yet.

After getting used to waking up not knowing where I am,
I might need some time
to adjust to having a regular pillow.

Mr. Shi went to market to watch lions.
The stone den was damp, so Mr. Shi had his servant wipe the den.
Then the story goes... my t-tongue got all twisted!

I'm just spacing out here.
While "since I'm already here" is a common principle,
I really don't have anything to do.
See you.
[Test] Hm? I didn't expect to run into someone else here.
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
【Test】Oh right, this is for you
【Test】Oh right, this is for you
[Test] Look, this is it.

【Test】Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.
[Test] Look, this is it.

【Test】Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

Sounds like a whole new experience compared to falling asleep anywhere and everywhere! Gahahahaha~ *hic*
I can't wait to try it!

Looking at our current situation,
the most direct way to improve our martial arts is—
to slash through everything in our path!

Is there anything I can help you with?
I'm not great at being a tour guide though,
It's my first time here too, so I don't know my way around.

...(思考)
About your invitation...
Oh, I need to deal with some disobedient ones first.

Looking around this world for some answers,
And all the scenic colors I haven't finished seeing here yet,
So could we save your invitation for next time?

"Dig a hole~ plant some seeds,
Count them one, two, three, four, five~"
Oh, hello there. I didn't expect to see anyone else here?

You know how in wuxia novels there's always secret martial arts scrolls hidden behind the mountain?
This place looks just like those mountains, so I thought I'd...
Wait a second—who are you?

<size=30>Could they be a rival disciple coming to steal our martial arts secrets?
But wait... I don't think the Lobster School has any rivals?</size>

【Test】What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync.

[Test] What a coincidence meeting you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync!

[Test] Ah~ You're all here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

Life's too short to miss out on beautiful scenes and moments.
That's why I'm not rushing home to pack—
I haven't finished exploring this place yet.

Lobster Fist—
Oh, it's you.

Meeting again?
Or am I lost again?

Gahahahaha~ga!
Seems like you don't know me well enough yet.
So let's keep walking forward, admiring each other along the way!

Gahaha~ha? Did you really believe that?
It's not any jelly-goo,
I'm Lauffie, a performer at the amusement park!

Oh, it's you.
Surprisingly,
I've found another sane person.

We meet again, how interesting!
I'm actually quite happy to see you.
Could it be... are you some kind of new gem?!
【Test】The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
【Test】The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
【Test】Oh right, this is for you
[Test] Oh right, this is for you
[Test] Look, this is it.

[Test] Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

You came at just the right time. I was testing
who would give up first - me or the fish.
Thank you for giving me a reason to let go.

There seems to be some mysterious force
That keeps bringing us together...
Could this be a secret sign left by some hidden master?
Frostia
【Test】Compania registration successful. You can now view it in Compania.

[Test] What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync with each other.

Don't look at me! I'd make a terrible landmark when you're lost,
'cause just like you,
I'm always on the move~ Hehe!

I can be too impulsive sometimes.
It's better to spend some quiet time alone.

Ah—! I-it's you—!
S-s-sorry about that!
Hey there! Lost your way too?

Gahaha~ha!
Looks like you're quite curious about me.
Well, so am I.
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to run into someone else here.
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to meet anyone else here.

[Test] Fancy meeting you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync with each other.

Oh, I'm just checking if the area is safe.
Need something?

Quiet.
That insect that just flew away must have been affected by some strange phenomenon.
Need something? If not, keep your distance.

This one isn't as effective as the last one.
It's been ten minutes and I'm still not sleepy.
Oh, hello.

Some say the meaning of travel is
meeting different people and then saying goodbye to them,
but now I think it's quite interesting to keep meeting the same person.
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
【Test】Oh right, here's something for you
【Test】Oh right, this is for you

【Test】Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.
[Test] Look, this is it.
[Test] Look, this is it.

Before heading back to pack,
We've gotta crack open all the rocks around here!
Let's go, Bhan-bhan!

Camera, paintbrush, sketchbook and destination,
I'm not sure which way to go for the next stop,
so{短暂停}would you draw me directions to your home?

It's you, it's you, all these surprises are you,
This time's surprise was meeting you by chance,
As for the surprise of an invitation, let's save that for next time.

Bhan, the fish got away!
Are you working for those fish?

Secret Technique — "Ten Lines at a Glance"!
Huh? When did that pillar get there?!
You... didn't see anything just now, right?

Well, look who it is!
"Fate" doesn't even begin to explain our chance meetings anymore.
I guess the world bubble really is round after all!
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to meet someone else here.
【Test】The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
【Test】Oh right, here you go

Before I move in with you,
I still have some things to take care of,
like... dealing with those who won't behave.
Hey there, Bhan~ Need something?

Hehe, did my Lobster Fist technique catch your eye?
Want me to "show you a thing or two"?
No can do! The techniques of our school are strictly confidential.

Oh, I guess this could also describe how fresh fish stays.
Gotta hurry home to keep the fish fresh after catching it! Wait a sec,
how did we end up on this topic again?

Thanks for trying to lead me back,
but this time I'm committed to staying lost.

Oh, are you here to dig up some info?
Aw, if I reveal the bug-catching surprise now,
it won't be exciting anymore!

Even though I thought that,
I still prepared myself
for the possibility of someone coming.

So...
I didn't mean to scare you.
If anything, I was waiting for you to surprise me!

<size=30>Being alone here,
           is driving me crazy.</size>
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to meet anyone else here.
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to run into someone else here.
[Test] Look, this is it.

There might be all sorts of reasons,
but I like watching you try so hard to convince me.
It's quite amusing.

After careful consideration and weighing all the factors,
plus to prove I'm not some directionally-challenged dummy,
I've decided to go with you!

Big treasures, little treasures,
Hidden gems, shy gems, gems yet to be found,
Let me see where you're hiding...

Just checking if there's anything wrong with this book I found, see if it needs special handling.
Oh, it's fine for now.
Did you need something?

Nice to meet you! This is how we say hello in the Jelly World.
I'm a talking jelly,
And yes, as you can see.

[Test] What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync with each other.

[Test] What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync!

So, you're offering me a brand~new~ paradise!
And there's no admission fee?
I can't believe such wonderful things exist in this world!
Oh? Alright, go ahead.

You look kinda familiar...
Sorry, I'm not good at remembering names that aren't gemstones.
Need something?

Pardon me,
I need to clear my mind and reflect on
the martial arts techniques I've learned along the way.

Oh, got hit in the shoulder by some weird supernatural thing.
Didn't break it though, it's healing up now.
Need something?

I have no idea what's going on here,
but I should still say this.
<size=64>Nice to meet you!</size>

Have we met before?
Sorry, I'm face-blind.
Gems of different colors are much easier to tell apart.
[Test] Failed to collect Star Badge
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
【Test】The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~

[Test] What a coincidence to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync with each other.

[Test] Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

[Test] Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

Trends go in circles,
Magazines show the same old content over and over,
But you're different - you make me curious and excited.

Perfect timing, my eyes could use a break.
Sometimes it's nice to step out of the script like this
and take a stroll in the real world.

One, two, three, four, practice more and more—
Hey, want to learn some warm-up exercises too?

Your outfit looks so lovely,
I couldn't help but take a second look.
Hi, I'm Medowlyn, I hope I didn't offend you.
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
[Test] Oh right, here you go.

I need a plan...
Gotta sneak back and pack up all my precious treasures,
Then zoom outta here!
[Test] Here you go

...
Me and the fish,
We never gave you permission to come closer.
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to run into someone else here.
【Test】Oh right, here you go

[Test] What a coincidence meeting you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync!

[Test] What a coincidence to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync.

Today's joy wasn't from the distant mountains or gentle breeze,
it was from you.
No wonder I couldn't help but steal a second glance when I first saw you.

...Oh, I'm gathering materials,
Fixing up my ride,
Might hit some turbulence on the way to your place.
[Test] Look, this is it.
[Test] Look, this is it.

Well then, from this moment on,
We're "almost-neighbors," right?
Let's try it out - almost-neighbor? Almost-neighbor?

Aha! I get it now! You keep talking to me because you want to know where the secret martial arts manual is hidden!
Sorry to disappoint you—I don't know either.

I rarely chat this much with people I've just met,
but you're an exception,
Grandma says it's not very nice to ignore someone's greeting.

It's important to maintain an actor's mystique.
There's this old saying that goes:
the more exposure you get, the less fresh you become.

You're still here?
It's not safe here, you should leave.
Oh, I don't have time to worry about you.

Oh, it's you! We've bumped into each other so many times,
I can recognize you now!
Though I still can't remember your name...

They say meetings are fate's little accidents,
But don't you think we're running into each other a bit too often?
Oh, or maybe this place is just too small.
【Test】Receive a Star Badge to invite companions to settle in Starcove.

[Test] Huh? Just like that?
Well, I guess there's nothing wrong with that...
(Testing)
[Test] Hmm? I didn't expect to meet someone else here.
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~

[Test] What a surprise to see you again!
Maybe we're just really in sync.

[Test] Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.{M_LookAtMe}

Gahahaha~ha!
So you're saying,
I'll have a fixed sleeping spot every day?

There are two ways to measure the world with your feet: traveling and walking.
I choose to take a stroll and enjoy the scenery.
Would you like to join me?

I left my "Drama Reference Guide" here.
Too bad, I was planning to use it as a pillow—
After all, I'm more about hands-on experience than hitting the books.

Still hanging around here?
Come on, let's get lost together!

Almost... just a bit more, bhan!
It got scared away...
You really didn't do that on purpose?

Hmm... it flew away,
Look at those beautiful colors on its body,
What color was it? I didn't get a good look at it.

Every moment spent close to nature
is an exchange of hearts and breath...{短暂停}breath?
Oh, it's you who's here. Hello there.

I'm standing here enjoying the view,
And in that view, I see someone else doing the same,
Hello there, fancy meeting you again.

...(thinking)
To run into you again today?
What a coincidence.

Since I've run into you again-again-again-again,
That must mean—
Fate is actually just a crop circle?!
[Test] The starry sky here is so beautiful, I wish I could take it home with me~
[Test] Here you go

Sorry about that, I must've dozed off after the performance.
Waking up in unfamiliar places like this...
It happens to me quite often.
【Test】Oh right, this is for you

I guess there's no reason to refuse...
So the conclusion is—I'm convinced!
<size=64>Let's go! Forward—</size>

Oh, before I move in with you,
I'll make sure there aren't any
spooky stories or weird things around here.

No, no, that won't do.
I need to find clues about where the secret martial arts scrolls are hidden.
May our paths cross again!

Shh.
I'm hunting for supernatural oddities.
Talk to you later.

I-is that you?!
<size=30>I just reached the seventh level of "Immovable as Mountain"!
It shouldn't be dangerous to stop here, right?</size>

*yaaawn*!
*strrretch*!
Oh, hello there.

Though I ended up here by accident,
Since I'm already here, might as well make the most of it!
That's, hmm... kind of my life philosophy.

There can't be two identical martial arts manuals in this world,
so—the one I saw before, that was you, wasn't it!

Meeting you again and again like this,
I don't think you're an ordinary person,
yet you look... perfectly normal.
Exchange contact info

Failed to exchange contact information, please check
(In Testing)

I just heard a strange noise...
Oh? You're still here.

Whoa—Wowza! It's you!
I was just about to throw away my insect net and unleash my secret warrior technique,
Guess that showdown will have to wait for next time. (slightly disappointed)

I fell asleep after the performance,
And somehow drifted here along the currents without realizing it.
Well, since this isn't where I planned to go, I might as well stay here.

So if you're looking for someone 
to do fun activities with around here,
feel free to count me in!

Hm? I didn't expect to run into someone else here.
(In Testing)

[Test] Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something twinkling in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.

【Test】Ah~ You're here too?
I just noticed something glinting in the Starsea, so I came out to take a look.{M_LookAtMe}
